t:test_case.t:objective: basic system check
Create test accounts
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Login to admin 2.Create test accounts

t:test_case.t:objective: Login as the test account and create appointments
Modify an instance of appointments.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search appointments. 2.Modify an instance of appointment (CreateAppointmentExceptionRequest).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an already modified daily appointment instance with valid values.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an already modified daily appointment instance with all old values.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) with all old values.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance with non-existing account name in attendees.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) with non-existing account name in attendees.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an already modified daily appointment instance with start and end time as Non numeric invalid values(Space/blanks/sometext/special charcters)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment with start and end time as Non numeric invalid values(ModifyAppointmentRequest).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance with start and end time as invalid numeric value (negative, very large number 20 digits /zero)
Modify a daily appointment instance inviting multiple people.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) inviting multiple people.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance inviting multiple people in which address of one attendee is non-existing..
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) inviting multiple people in which address of one attendee is non-existing.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance inviting multiple people in which address of all attendees is non-existing.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) inviting multiple people in which address of all attendees is non-existing.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance having attendee whose account has been deleted.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Delete an account. 2.Search the appointment. 3.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) having attendee whose account has been deleted.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance and check whether the attendee get both the mails or not.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest). 3.Login to account 2. 4.Search in the attendee's account both(created and modified) mails.

t:test_case.t:objective: Attempt to modify a daily appointment instance that has been modified already.(Re sending ModifyAppointmentRequest)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify an instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest). 3.Search the appointment. 4.Modify an instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) that has been modified already.

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify NOT_THE_ORGANIZER return code (acct2 attempts to modify an appointment owned by acct1)
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Login to account2 2.Search the appointment. 3.Modify an instance of appointment.(ModifyAppointmentRequest).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance making it a all day appointment.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) making it a all day appointment.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance in which start time is greater than end time.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) instance in which start time is greater than end time.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance making it schedule to some other day.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest) making it schedule to some other day .

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance making it schedule to some other day in which start date is greater than end date.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify the instance of appointment(ModifyAppointmentRequest).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance which was canceled.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Cancel the appointment. 3.Modify an instance of appointment which was canceled.

t:select.match: .*cannot modify a calendar item under trash$

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a weekly appointment instance with valid values.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify an instance of appointment.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a monthly appointment instance with valid values.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify an instance of appointment.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a yearly appointment instance with valid values.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify an instance of appointment.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance with invalid positive value for id (Negative/Zero/large number).
Modify a daily appointment instance with invalid value for id (Space/blank/sometext/special character)
Modify a daily appointment instance with no m tag.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Search the appointment. 2.Modify an instance of appointment with no m tag.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance with no e and s tag.
Modify a daily appointment instance with no 'or' tag
t:test_case.steps: 1. Login as acct7. 2. Create a appt. 3. Modify with no OR tag.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a daily appointment instance with no subject tag.
